meta.name: description
meta.content: Cotter Public Shools in Cotter, Arkansas is right on the White River & near Bull Shoals Lake offers state-of-the-art technology in the classroom with a unique & diverse learning environment.

span.strong: School Choice is now open!! Click here to print forms. Learn More

div.strong: School Choice is now open!! Click here to print forms. Please mail your forms by April 30, 2020 to:

br.strong: **Thursday, April 30th, from 10:00 a.m. to 11:00 a.m. we will be delivering caps and gowns to 2020 seniors via curbside delivery. This means seniors drive up and never get out of their car. We will check them off and hand cap and gowns through their windows. Everyone keeps their distance and no gathering allowed. If you need to know "if" or "how much" you owe for your cap and gown you can email Ms. Kelly at... kmcbee@cotterschools.net. No date or plans have been decided for graduation, we would, however, like seniors to have their gowns in order that they may take pictures in them if they wish. A REMIND will be sent if any graduation information changes.

div.div: We are proud to be located in beautiful Cotter, Arkansas right on the world-famous White River and near Bull Shoals Lake. Our students have the opportunity to live and learn in a rural setting where natural resources abound. We love hands-on learning and explore our resources as much as possible. This, paired with our state-of-the-art technology in the classroom, offers a unique, diverse learning environment.

button.class: btn btnWhite reg btn-block text-right py-3

a.class: btn btnWhite reg btn-block text-right py-3

div.div: Cotter Public Schools will provide all students with the skills necessary to succeed in a diverse, changing, global society. Opportunities for developing skills in technology, critical thinking, and communication will be available at all grade levels.

div.strong: School Choice is now open!! Click here to print forms. Please mail your forms by April 30, 2020 to:

div.class: h1 main ls1 text-blue text-uppercase mb-3

div.div: FIRST, you must live in our school district in order to be eligible for enrollment. Check this map to make sure!
NEXT, fill out the information below to start the enrollment process. A staff member from Cotter Public Schools will contact you shortly to complete the enrollment process.
